title: Ventspils Olimpiskais Stadions
text: Ventspils Olimpiskais Stadions, more commonly called the Ventspils Stadions, is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Ventspils">Ventspils</a>, <a href="Latvia">Latvia</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. Ventspils Stadions is the home stadium for <a href="FK%20Ventspils">FK Ventspils</a>, and one of the most famous football stadia in the <a href="Latvia">Latvia</a>. The stadium holds 3,200 people.
